item.title: Melanie add a quote by Ellen Hopkins
item.description: "In a woman's womb another chance to make the world a better place." -- Ellen Hopkins

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description:
"Please, no matter how we advance technologically, please don't abandon the book. There is nothing in our material world more beautiful than the book."
(Acceptance speech, <i>National Book Award 2010 (Nonfiction)</i>, November 17, 2010)" -- Patti Smith

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "Jesus died for somebody's sins, but not mine." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "For life is the best thing we have in this existence. And if we should desire to believe in something, it should be a beacon within. This beacon being the sun, sea, and sky, our children, our work, our companions and, most simply put, the embodiment of love." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "I have loved books all my life. There is nothing more beautiful in our material world than the book." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "So my last image was as the first. A sleeping youth cloaked in light, who opened his eyes with a smile of recognition for someone who had never been a stranger." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "In art and dream may you proceed with abandon. In life may you proceed with balance and stealth. For nothing is more precious than the life force and may the love of that force guide you as you go." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Melanie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Our task must be to free ourselves... by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and it's beauty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Aesop
item.description: "No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted." -- Aesop

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "Until he extends the circle of his compassion to all living things, man will not himself find peace." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "We love the things we love for what they are." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Thomas Campbell
item.description: "To live in hearts we leave behind is not to die." -- Thomas Campbell

item.title: Melanie add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Not all those who wander are lost." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Jane Goodall
item.description: "We have so far to go to realize our human potential for compassion, altruism, and love." -- Jane Goodall

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Jane Goodall
item.description: "Farm animals are far more aware and intelligent than we ever imagined and, despite having been bred as domestic slaves, they are individual beings in their own right. As such, they deserve our respect. And our help. Who will plead for them if we are silent? Thousands of people who say they ‘love’ animals sit down once or twice a day to enjoy the flesh of creatures who have been treated so with little respect and kindness just to make more meat." -- Jane Goodall

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Jane Goodall
item.description: "And if we dare to look into those eyes, then we shall feel their suffering in our hearts. More and more people have seen that appeal and felt it in their hearts. All around the world there is an awakening of understanding and compassion, and understanding that reaches out to help the suffering animals in their vanishing homelands. That embraces hungry, sick, and desperate human beings, people who are starving while the fortunate among us have so much more than we need. And if, one by one, we help them, the hurting animals, the desperate humans, then together we shall alleviate so much of the hunger, fear, and pain in the world. Together we can bring change to the world, gradually replacing fear and hatred with compassion and love. Love for all living beings." -- Jane Goodall

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Jane Goodall
item.description: "The least I can do is speak out for those who cannot speak for themselves." -- Jane Goodall

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Jane Goodall
item.description: "What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make." -- Jane Goodall
